name: Greylist
description: Allow access while keeping security features based on internal and external IP/network/rDNS/ASN greylists.

GREYLIST_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_IP.label: Greylist IP/network

GREYLIST_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_RDNS.label: Greylist reverse DNS

GREYLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.help: Only perform RDNS greylist checks on global IP addresses.
GREYLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.label: Greylist reverse DNS global IPs

GREYLIST_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_ASN.label: Greylist ASN

GREYLIST_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_USER_AGENT.label: Greylist User-Agent

GREYLIST_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_URI.label: Greylist URI

GREYLIST_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good IP/network to put into the greylist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
GREYLIST_IP_URLS.label: Greylist IP/network URLs

GREYLIST_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to put into the greylist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
GREYLIST_RDNS_URLS.label: Greylist reverse DNS URLs

GREYLIST_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to put into the greylist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
GREYLIST_ASN_URLS.label: Greylist ASN URLs

GREYLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good User-Agent to put into the greylist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
GREYLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Greylist User-Agent URLs

GREYLIST_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad URI to put into the greylist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
GREYLIST_URI_URLS.label: Greylist URI URLs
